actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation with a declaration of taking certain tracts of land (and contracts for the sale of timber thereon) in the Big Thicket National Preserve.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation specified lands, and contracts for the sale of timber thereon, within the Big Thicket National Preserve, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation with a declaration of taking certain tracts of land (and contracts for the sale of timber thereon) in the Big Thicket National Preserve.
